file.name: ServicingOrder.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Servicing Order
  description: This service domain handles the processing of a customer servicing request as a predefined procedure. A range of standard servicing requests can be supported. The process can include a check of permissions when the request is made by a third party/service provider
  version: 10.0.0
servers:
- description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
  url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/BIAN-3/ServicingOrder/10.0.0
paths:
  /ServicingOrder/Initiate:
    post:
      tags:
      - CR - ServicingOrderProcedure
      summary: InCR Initiate a servicing order (within a contact session)
      description: InCR Initiate a servicing order (within a contact session)
      operationId: Initiate
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/InitiateServicingOrderProcedureRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitiateServicingOrderProcedureResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /ServicingOrder/{servicingorderId}/Execute:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - ServicingOrderProcedure
      summary: ExCR Execute an automated task in a servicing order (e.g. upload data)
      description: ExCR Execute an automated task in a servicing order (e.g. upload data)
      operationId: Execute
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ServicingOrderID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/ExecuteServicingOrderProcedureRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExecuteServicingOrderProcedureResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /ServicingOrder/{servicingorderId}/Request:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - ServicingOrderProcedure
      summary: RqCR Request manual intervention in a servicing order (e.g. engage a servicing agent)
      description: RqCR Request manual intervention in a servicing order (e.g. engage a servicing agent)
      operationId: Request
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ServicingOrderID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/RequestServicingOrderProcedureRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RequestServicingOrderProcedureResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /ServicingOrder/{servicingorderId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - CR - ServicingOrderProcedure
      summary: ReCR Retrieve details about a servicing order
      description: ReCR Retrieve details about a servicing order
      operationId: Retrieve
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ServicingOrderID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveServicingOrderProcedureResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
components:
  schemas:
    ServicingOrderProcedure:
      type: object
      properties:
        ThirdPartyReference:
          type: object
        ThirdPartyServicingMandateReference:
          type: object
        ThirdPartyServicingMandate:
          type: string
        CustomerReference:
          type: object
        CustomerEligibilityAssessmentInstanceReference:
          type: object
        ServicingOrderType:
          type: string
        ServicingOrderTaskRecord:
          type: string
        ServicingOrderDescription:
          type: string
        Date:
          type: string
        EmployeeOrBusinessUnitReference:
          type: object
        ServicingOrderWorkProduct:
          type: string
        ServicingOrderWorkTaskResult:
          type: string
    HTTPError:
      type: object
      properties:
        status_code:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
    InitiateServicingOrderProcedureRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        ServicingOrderProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            ThirdPartyReference:
              type: object
            ThirdPartyServicingMandateReference:
              type: object
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            CustomerEligibilityAssessmentInstanceReference:
              type: object
            ServicingOrderType:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderTaskRecord:
              type: string
            EmployeeOrBusinessUnitReference:
              type: object
    InitiateServicingOrderProcedureResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        ServicingOrderProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            ServicingOrderTaskRecord:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderDescription:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderWorkProduct:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderWorkTaskResult:
              type: string
    ExecuteServicingOrderProcedureRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        ServicingOrderProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            ThirdPartyReference:
              type: object
            ThirdPartyServicingMandateReference:
              type: object
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            CustomerEligibilityAssessmentInstanceReference:
              type: object
            ServicingOrderType:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderTaskRecord:
              type: string
            EmployeeOrBusinessUnitReference:
              type: object
    ExecuteServicingOrderProcedureResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        ServicingOrderProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            ServicingOrderTaskRecord:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderDescription:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderWorkProduct:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderWorkTaskResult:
              type: string
    RequestServicingOrderProcedureRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        ServicingOrderProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            ThirdPartyReference:
              type: object
            ThirdPartyServicingMandateReference:
              type: object
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            CustomerEligibilityAssessmentInstanceReference:
              type: object
            ServicingOrderType:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderTaskRecord:
              type: string
            EmployeeOrBusinessUnitReference:
              type: object
    RequestServicingOrderProcedureResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        ServicingOrderProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            ServicingOrderTaskRecord:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderDescription:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderWorkProduct:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderWorkTaskResult:
              type: string
    RetrieveServicingOrderProcedureResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        ServicingOrderProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            ThirdPartyReference:
              type: object
            ThirdPartyServicingMandateReference:
              type: object
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            CustomerEligibilityAssessmentInstanceReference:
              type: object
            ServicingOrderType:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderTaskRecord:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderDescription:
              type: string
            EmployeeOrBusinessUnitReference:
              type: object
            ServicingOrderWorkProduct:
              type: string
            ServicingOrderWorkTaskResult:
              type: string
  parameters:
    ServicingOrderID:
      name: servicingorderId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false
      schema:
        type: string
  requestBodies:
    InitiateServicingOrderProcedureRequest:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitiateServicingOrderProcedureRequest'
    ExecuteServicingOrderProcedureRequest:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExecuteServicingOrderProcedureRequest'
    RequestServicingOrderProcedureRequest:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/RequestServicingOrderProcedureRequest'
  responses:
    HTTPError:
      description: Bad Request
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    BadRequestError:
      description: Bad Request
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    UnauthorizedError:
      description: Unauthorized
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    ForbiddenError:
      description: Forbidden
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    NotFoundError:
      description: Not Found
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    TooManyRequestsError:
      description: Too Many Requests
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    InternalServerError:
      description: Internal Server Error
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
...
